mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id AS reviewId, r.apt_seq AS aptSeq, r.user_id AS userId, u.profile_img AS profileImg, r.review_content AS reviewContent, r.review_rating AS reviewRating, r.review_date AS reviewDate FROM reviews r JOIN users u ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.apt_seq = #{aptSeq} ORDER BY r.review_date DESC, r.review_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (apt_seq, user_id, review_content, review_rating, review_date) VALUES (#{aptSeq}, #{userId}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewRating}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(AVG(r.review_rating), 0) AS avgRating, SUM(CASE WHEN r.review_rating = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count1, SUM(CASE WHEN r.review_rating = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count2, SUM(CASE WHEN r.review_rating = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count3, SUM(CASE WHEN r.review_rating = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count4, SUM(CASE WHEN r.review_rating = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count5 FROM reviews r WHERE r.apt_seq = #{aptSeq}
